oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agribio II : Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This part of program (1 project) concerns environmental impact (on the air and water) of the ruminant breeding systems in organic farming. The emissions of N - (NH3, NO, NO3), CH4, CO2-energy direct and indirect are evaluated.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: { Programme part} Agribio II : Environmental aspects. Runs 2004 - 2007. Programme Leader(s): Dulphy, Jean-Pierre and Hacala, Sylvie.
